comment: If you want to learn Latin and Roman culture, she is the one. She is uber excited to teach and has the best personality I have ever met. Wonderful woman and honestly cares about her students. If you need to take a lang. take it with her
Awesome professor! She's very passionate about Latin and the Roman culture. She's very inspiring, and makes the material very easy to understand. She's amazing!
Great teacher! Very understanding, sweet, and passionate about what she does. I thought Latin was going to be tedious but she made it fun! I can't wait to take her for my second year!

I loved this teacher.  She was smart, funny, easy to talk to.  She is an easier teacher than most, and does have sympathy for students with extenuating circumstances.  She expects output, but is not hyper obsessive about it.

FANTASTIC TEACHER! I love LOVE Ms. Clouse, she is the best teacher I have ever had in my life! No joke. Her class is much fun and she really knows Latin, she can pretty much speak it. She teaches so wonderfully, I took Latin in high school, but she easily taught me more than I knew. Take her class, even if just for the intellectual stimulation!
